summary: Comprehensive testing of Memora wedding memory app completed. Full user flow tested from landing page through memory creation to admin panel. Backend APIs working correctly, frontend navigation and functionality working well.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with MEMORA logo, tagline, Begin button, and admin settings icon
Navigation flow: Landing -> Name -> Capture -> Message -> Final Memory works correctly
Name entry page shows couple names and welcome text from settings
Photo capture page allows skipping photo (camera functionality present)
Message page has textarea with 200 character limit working correctly
Save memory submits to backend and navigates to final memory page
Final memory page displays guest name and message correctly
Leave another memory button resets and returns to landing page
Admin page requires password (memora2024) and login works
Admin can view and manage settings (couple names, welcome text)
Admin can view all memories and download PDF
Backend API: GET /api/settings returns correct settings
Backend API: POST /api/memories creates memory with 201 status
Backend API: GET /api/memories returns all memories
Backend API: Admin login with valid/invalid passwords works
Backend API: GET /api/memories/pdf generates PDF download
